name: Cube-Pocalypse
description:
Have you ever made a game in Unity? I hadn't either. So, I searched around YouTube and found a tutorial from the user Brackeys. It's a pretty quick series, but was fun and easy enough to get the toes wet in building a game from start to finish in Unity. I hope you enjoy!

Controls:

  • A / Left Arrow - Move Left
  • D / Right Arrow - Move Right
  • Q - Quit
